definition[0]_en: A groove pitch for an analog cylinder in the range of 60-64 turns per cm, or 150 or 160 turns per inch, for 6 1/8 inch dictation format cylinders, or 200 turns per inch for 4-minute cylinders.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A groove pitch for an analog cylinder in the range of 60-64 turns per cm, or 150 or 160 turns per inch, for 6 1/8 inch dictation format cylinders, or 200 turns per inch for 4-minute cylinders.

definition[0]_en: A groove pitch for an analog cylinder of 40 turns per cm or 100 turns per inch.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A groove pitch for an analog cylinder of 40 turns per cm or 100 turns per inch.
